lesson: CRITICAL LESSON: Sold at $5080.00 but price rallied to $5300.00 (+4.3%). Features that caused bad signal: ['rsi_overbought', 'bear_flag']. DO NOT SELL INTO STRONG UPTRENDS even if RSI is 'overbought'!
